english.segment2: Nothing but a chemical in my head. It's nothing but laziness. Cuz I dont wanna read the book. I'll watch the movie. Cuz its not me. I'm just like everybody else my age
english.segment3: I think I'd rather play around. And I think I'd rather watch tv. Cuz I dont wanna face my fears. I'll watch the movie. Its not me
english.segment4: I'm just like everybody else. I'm just like everybody else because
english.segment5: I don't wanna be here, I don't wanna see this now. It's all wrong but its - all right
english.segment6: And I don't wanna be here, I don't wanna study now. It's all wrong but its all right
english.segment7: I don't know what love is. And I don't know who I am. And if I ever wanna find out. I'll watch the movie. Cuz it's not me. I'm just like everybody else my age
english.segment8: I don't wanna change the world. And I don't wanna be someone. And I don't wanna write the book - I'll make the movie. Cuz it's not me. I'm just like everybody else (I'm just like everybody else). I'm just like everybody else
english.segment9: I don't wanna be here, I don't wanna see this now. It's all wrong but its - all right
english.segment10: And I don't wanna be here, I don't wanna study now. It's all wrong but it's all right
